casebody.data:
COKER, et al.
v.
DAIMLERCHRYSLER CORP. No. 532A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 22, 2005. Mona Lisa Wallace, Salisbury, Cathy Williams, Gary K. Shipman, Wilmington, for James Coker, et al. Sidney S. Eagles, Jr., Raleigh, Allison O. VanLanningham, Greensboro, Raymond M. Kethledge, Troy, MI, for DaimlerChrysler Corp.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of November 2005 by Plaintiffs for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiffs (James Coker, et al) shall have up to and including the 20th day of December 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of November 2005."
